shape.description:

textAlign.description:
搜索栏内容位置
@en Search bar content location

tags.en: Search bar content location

搜索栏头部插入的内容
@en Content inserted in the header of the search box
prepend.name: prepend

tags.en: Content inserted in the header of the search box

prepend.descWithTags: 搜索栏头部插入的内容

append.description:
搜索栏尾部要插入的内容, 默认在搜索栏激活态时会插入一个按钮
@en The content to be inserted at the end of the search box, a button will be inserted by default when the search box is activated
append.name: append

tags.en: The content to be inserted at the end of the search box, a button will be inserted by default when the search box is activated

append.descWithTags: 搜索栏尾部要插入的内容, 默认在搜索栏激活态时会插入一个按钮

actionButton.description:
搜索栏最右侧要插入的按钮，默认情况下插入一个取消按钮
@en The button to insert on the far right side of the search box, a cancel button is inserted by default
actionButton.name: actionButton

tags.en: The button to insert on the far right side of the search box, a cancel button is inserted by default

actionButton.descWithTags: 搜索栏最右侧要插入的按钮，默认情况下插入一个取消按钮

enableAssociation.description:
是否开启搜索联想框功能
@en Whether to enable the search association box function
enableAssociation.name: enableAssociation

tags.en: Whether to enable the search association box function

enableAssociation.descWithTags: 是否开启搜索联想框功能

associationVisible.description:
（受控模式）搜索联想框的可见态
@en (Controlled mode) Visible state of search association box
associationVisible.name: associationVisible

tags.en: (Controlled mode) Visible state of search association box

associationVisible.descWithTags: （受控模式）搜索联想框的可见态

associationShowType.description:
非受控模式下，搜索联想框的展示时机 - focus 仅聚焦时 - value 搜索词不为空 - default 搜索栏被聚焦或者搜索词不为空 - always 一直展示
@en In uncontrolled mode, the display timing of the search association box - "focus" only when focused - "value" search term is not empty - "default" search bar is focused or search term is not empty - "always" always displayed
associationShowType.name: associationShowType

tags.en: In uncontrolled mode, the display timing of the search association box - "focus" only when focused - "value" search term is not empty - "default" search bar is focused or search term is not empty - "always" always displayed

associationShowType.descWithTags: 非受控模式下，搜索联想框的展示时机 - focus 仅聚焦时 - value 搜索词不为空 - default 搜索栏被聚焦或者搜索词不为空 - always 一直展示

associationItems.description:
每一项搜索内容
@en every search
associationItems.name: associationItems

tags.en: every search

highlightMode.description:
搜索结果高亮模式，可以是内置的两种模式，或者一个自定义的高亮函数(接受选项内容content、搜索关键字keyword、默认的高亮class，返回一个ReactNode) - prefix 高亮最长前缀匹配字符串 - contain 高亮所有搜索关键字 - none 关闭高亮
@en Search result highlighting mode, which can be two built-in modes, or a custom highlighting function(Accept option content content, search keyword keyword, default highlight class, return a ReactNode) - "prefix" to highlight the longest prefix matching string - "contain" to highlight all search keywords - "none" to turn off highlighting
highlightMode.name: highlightMode

tags.en: Search result highlighting mode, which can be two built-in modes, or a custom highlighting function(Accept option content content, search keyword keyword, default highlight class, return a ReactNode) - "prefix" to highlight the longest prefix matching string - "contain" to highlight all search keywords - "none" to turn off highlighting

highlightMode.descWithTags: 搜索结果高亮模式，可以是内置的两种模式，或者一个自定义的高亮函数(接受选项内容content、搜索关键字keyword、默认的高亮class，返回一个ReactNode) - prefix 高亮最长前缀匹配字符串 - contain 高亮所有搜索关键字 - none 关闭高亮

highlightStyle.description:
要为高亮结果添加的样式，仅非自定高亮模式下生效

highlightClassName.description:

tags.en: The class to be added to the highlighting result, only valid in non-custom highlighting mode

blockChangeWhenCompositing.description:
当 ios 输入中文时，输拼音的过程不触发onChange，仅确认选择后触发
@en When inputting Chinese on ios, onChange is not triggered during pinyin input, but only after confirming the selection
blockChangeWhenCompositing.name: blockChangeWhenCompositing

tags.en: When inputting Chinese on ios, onChange is not triggered during pinyin input, but only after confirming the selection

validator.description:
正则验证，不符合验证的不允许输入
@en Regular validation, input is not allowed if it does not meet the validation

tags.en: Regular validation, input is not allowed if it does not meet the validation

validator.descWithTags: 正则验证，不符合验证的不允许输入

blurBeforeFocus.description:
在聚焦之前blur掉，即切换不同input时会重新弹起键盘，常用于input type切换时重新加载键盘，安卓上有效
@en Blur before focusing, that is, the keyboard will be re-bounced when switching between different inputs. It is often used to reload the keyboard when the input type is switched. It is valid on Android.
blurBeforeFocus.name: blurBeforeFocus

tags.en: Blur before focusing, that is, the keyboard will be re-bounced when switching between different inputs. It is often used to reload the keyboard when the input type is switched. It is valid on Android.

blurBeforeFocus.descWithTags: 在聚焦之前blur掉，即切换不同input时会重新弹起键盘，常用于input type切换时重新加载键盘，安卓上有效

是否有清除按钮

clearShowType.description:
清除按钮展示时机：focus - 聚焦时展示 value - 有值则展示 always - 始终展示
@en Clear button display timing: focus - display when focused, value - display when there is value, always - always display
clearShowType.name: clearShowType

tags.en: Clear button display timing: focus - display when focused, value - display when there is value, always - always display

clearShowType.descWithTags: 清除按钮展示时机：focus - 聚焦时展示 value - 有值则展示 always - 始终展示

preventEventWhenClearing.description:
在聚焦模式下点击清除按钮时，是否要屏蔽对应产生的onBlur和onFocus事件
@en Whether to block the onBlur and onFocus events generated when the clear button is clicked in focus mode
preventEventWhenClearing.name: preventEventWhenClearing

tags.en: Whether to block the onBlur and onFocus events generated when the clear button is clicked in focus mode

preventEventWhenClearing.descWithTags: 在聚焦模式下点击清除按钮时，是否要屏蔽对应产生的onBlur和onFocus事件

toggleAssociation.name: toggleAssociation
toggleAssociation.description:
仅非受控模式下生效，手动控制搜索联想框的显隐，如果没有传入值则默认将显隐状态反转
@en It only takes effect in uncontrolled mode. Manually control the display and hide of the search association box. If there is no incoming value, the display and hidden state will be reversed by default.

tags.en: It only takes effect in uncontrolled mode. Manually control the display and hide of the search association box. If there is no incoming value, the display and hidden state will be reversed by default.

toggleAssociation.descWithTags: 仅非受控模式下生效，手动控制搜索联想框的显隐，如果没有传入值则默认将显隐状态反转
